yaml_deprecated.description: Sony Projector now uses config entries. Remove the `sony_projector` YAML from configuration.yaml and configure the integration from Settings → Devices & Services.

confirm.title: Update automations to use the projector entity
confirm.description:
Your legacy switch entity {switch_entity_id} is available to keep existing automations working while you migrate. Update automations, scripts, and scenes to target the projector media player entity using the `media_player.turn_on` and `media_player.turn_off` actions.

To find references, open Settings → Developer tools → Search and look up the switch entity to see related automations and scripts. When finished, select Submit to dismiss this message.
